column2: Best African Art/Ethnic Art Dealer in Los Angeles
column3: This eclectic gallery of African and ethnic art also features shows by mainly local artists -- most recently by Ed Moses and Zachary Aronson. Ernie Wolfe is the world's leading expert on West Africa Hollywood movie posters and African fantasy coffins. Ernie cooks up game-laced chile for openings and throws spur of the moment feasts of tuna, lobster, or boar. The gallery is only open Saturdays 12-5 and by appointment. Call Ernie (always in shorts) or spouse Diane (in leopard patterned attire) and they will meet you there.
